DOC.brief_title: An Extension Protocol PRO 140_CD01 TS Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects complete 12 week treatment PRO 140_CD01 study without experience virologic failure . 2 . Both male female patient partner childbearing potential must agree use appropriate birth control method ( birth control pill , barrier , abstinence ) throughout study duration ( exclude woman childbearing potential men sterilize ) .
